channel.title: Equipting Bows, C bows, and other bows problem
channel.description: When i equip range weapons, on the combat tab it says i have -2 equipped and -2 is not a weopon its a number 2 below 0... And how are you suppose to kills monsters with a -2?.... how do i fix it? :)
